00034 enum SmsFilterType {
00036     AllSmsFilterType          = 0,
00038 #if defined (APOXI_SMS_NEW_PROVIDERS)
00039     InboxSmsFilterType        = 1,
00041     OutboxSmsFilterType       = 2,
00043     ArchiveSmsFilterType      = 3,
00045     StatusReportSmsFilterType = 4,
00047     UnreadSmsFilterType       = 5,
00049 #else
00050     UnreadSmsFilterType       = 1,
00052     ReadSmsFilterType         = 2,
00054     UnsentSmsFilterType       = 3,
00056     SentSmsFilterType         = 4
00057 #endif
00058 };

00060 /*  ========================================================================
00061     SmsDeleteStatus
00062     ======================================================================== */
00064 enum SmsDeleteStatus {
00066     SmsDeleteRead =     0x01,           // 0000 0001
00068     SmsDeleteUnread =   0x02,           // 0000 0010
00070     SmsDeleteSent =     0x04,           // 0000 0100
00072     SmsDeleteUnsent =   0x08            // 0000 1000
00073 };

00079 class SmsWStringCache
00080 {
00081     public:
00082         enum {
00083             c_invalid_rec_no = 0x2000
00084         };
00085 
00086     class Entry
00087     {
00088         public:
00089             Entry(INT size) { m_recno=c_invalid_rec_no; m_text.PreAlloc(size+1); }
00090 
00091             UINT16              GetRecNo() const { return m_recno; }
00092             const WString &     GetText() const { return m_text; }
00093             void SetData(UINT16 recno, const WString & text) { m_recno=recno; m_text = text; }
00094 
00095         private:
00096             UINT16      m_recno;
00097             WString     m_text;
00098     };
00099 
00100     typedef FixedPtrArray<Entry> CacheArray;
00101 
00102     public:
00103         SmsWStringCache();
00104         ~SmsWStringCache();
00105         
00106         void Init(INT noofentries, INT noofchars);
00107         UINT16 Put(const WString & string, UINT16 newrecno, UINT16 & cacheidx);
00108 
00109         const WString & GetWString(INT index) const {
00110             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_cachearray[index]!=0);
00111             return m_cachearray[index]->GetText();
00112         };
00113         UINT16 GetRecNo(INT index) const {
00114             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_cachearray[index]!=0);
00115             return m_cachearray[index]->GetRecNo();
00116         };
00117         void SetData(INT index, UINT16 recno, const WString & text) {
00118             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_cachearray[index]!=0);
00119             m_cachearray[index]->SetData(recno, text);
00120         };
00121 
00122 
00123     private:
00124         INT                m_noofentries;
00125         INT                m_noofchars;
00126         CacheArray         m_cachearray;
00127         INT                m_iterator;
00128 };

00164 /*  ========================================================================
00165     TpduHeaderInformation
00166     ======================================================================== */
00168 struct TpduPhoneNumberPersist
00169 {
00170     UINT8 m_data[12];
00171 
00172     void Clear() { 
00173         memset(m_data,0xFF,sizeof(m_data)); 
00174         m_data[0] = 0; 
00175     }
00176     BOOLEAN IsEqual(const TpduPhoneNumberPersist & persist) const { 
00177         return memcmp(m_data, persist.m_data, sizeof(m_data))==0; 
00178     }
00179     void Set(const PhoneNumber & phno) {
00180         Clear();
00181         memcpy(m_data,phno.GetRawBCDBuffer(),phno.GetRawBCDLength());
00182     }
00183 };
00184

00250         TpduPhoneNumberPersist          m_phnr;             // 12 byte
00251         DateTime::Persist               m_datetime;         // 4  byte
00252 #if defined(APOXI_ENABLE_CONC_SMS_SCA_CHECK)
00253         UINT32                          m_sca_hash;         // 4  byte
00254 #endif
00255         DataCodingScheme                m_dcs;              // 2  byte
00256         SmsPortNo                       m_sms_port_no;      // 2  byte
00257         UINT16                          m_conc_ref_no;      // 2  byte 
00258         UINT16                          m_int_ref_no;       // 2  byte
00259         struct {                                            
00260             UINT                        m_reply_path_exists   : 1;
00261             UINT                        m_is_concateneted     : 1;
00262             UINT                        m_concateneted_status : 2;
00263             UINT                        m_msg_type            : 4;
00264             UINT                        m_msg_class           : 4;
00265             UINT                        m_coding_group        : 4;   
00266         } m_bitfield;                                       // 2  byte 
00267         UINT8                           m_conc_max_no;      // 1  byte
00268         UINT8                           m_conc_seq_no;      // 1  byte
00269         UINT8                           m_storagetype;      // 1  byte
00270         SmsReferenceNumber              m_refno;            // 1  byte
00271         ShortMessageStatus              m_msg_status;       // 1  byte
00272         UINT8                           m_payload_size;     // 1  byte
00273         ProtocolIdentifier              m_protid;           // 1  byte
00274         UINT8                           m_conc_num;         // 1  byte
00275         UINT8                           m_status;           // 1  byte
00276         UINT8                           m_sim_stored;       // 1  byte
00277         UINT8                           m_flash_stored;     // 1  byte
00278         UINT16                          m_cache_pos;        // 2  bytes
00279                                                             // Sum = 43 bytes + 1 = 44 bytes
00280         BOOLEAN                         m_wrong_status;     // 1  byte
00281                                                             // Sum = 42 bytes
00282         static UINT16                   m_max_conc_ref_no;
00283         UINT32                          m_extended_data;    // 4 additional bytes
00284 };

00322 const UINT16 c_max_smsr_in_ram = 5;
00323 const UINT16 c_max_smsr_pdus = 20;

00325 const UINT16 c_max_nvram_pdus = DR_MAX_NVRAM_SMS;
00326 const UINT16 c_max_pdus = c_max_sim_pdus + c_max_nvram_pdus + c_max_smsr_pdus;
00327 const UINT16 c_max_table1 = c_max_pdus/2;

00475         TpduHeaderInformation * GetTpduHeaderInformationPtr(INT idx) { 
00476             ASSERT_DEBUG(idx<c_max_pdus);
00477             if(idx<c_max_table1) {
00478                 return &m_header_entries1[idx];
00479             } else {
00480                 return &m_header_entries2[idx-c_max_table1];
00481             }
00482         }

00536 
00537         DateTime::Persist GetDateTime(INT recno, SmsFilterType filter) {
00538             INT tpduno = GetTpduNo(recno, filter);
00539             
00540             if(tpduno < 0) {
00541                 DateTime::Persist dt_zero = {0};
00542                 return dt_zero;
00543             }
00544             TpduHeaderInformation * headerinfo = GetTpduHeaderInformationPtr(tpduno);
00545             ASSERT_DEBUG(headerinfo != 0);
00546 
00547             return headerinfo->GetDateTime();
00548         }
